thread.title: Zoe Aspinwall
thread.title_full: The Spain Event evaluado por Zoe Aspinwall

author: Zoe Aspinwall
title: Zoe Aspinwall
text:
We have recently returned from Madrid after celebrating our friends 50th Birthday. There were 26 of us travelling so I was quite concerned about booking restaurants and events before we went as we were such a large party!
My own background is in pubs, clubs & hospitality and I know how difficult it can be when large parties arrive without notice, fortunately I found 'The Spain Event Company', 'Aaron' & 'Souki' !
At first I was very dubious about using a company but all I can say is everything that was promised was delivered and MORE!
Aaron recommended and booked everything ahead of our trip and all went like a dream. We had booked a 'Tapas Tour' on the evening we arrived and we were very lucky to have the best possible guide 'Souki'.
Aaron arranged absolutely everything, meet n greet at the airport, coach transfers to and from our hotel ,tapas tour, I-pad tour, beer bikes and even a birthday cake ! Souki even arranged ballons for the restaurant on the evening of the birthday dinner.
If you have any reservations about using this company all I can say is don't, take Aarons advice and leave him to it.
I had checked prices on everything previously and when I asked Aaron for a Quote: was pleasantly surprised, in actual fact it probably cost less than Â£10 per head more than if we had booked direct, this was worth every penny to ensure everything ran smoothly and have one point of contact while we stayed in Madrid.
I will definitely use this company for future trips and recommend you do to!
